# commonEHR <a href='https://cc-hic.github.io/commonEHR/'><img src='logo.png' align="right" height="139" /></a>

<!-- badges: start -->
[![Lifecycle Status](https://img.shields.io/badge/lifecycle-experimental-orange.svg)](https://www.tidyverse.org/lifecycle/)
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of commonEHR is to provide common functionality to serve the ...EHR
ecosystem of R packages.

## Installation

You can install the released version of commonEHR from [GitGub](https://www.github.com/DocEd/commonEHR) with:

``` r
remotes::install_packages("DocEd/commonEHR")
```
